body.name: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan (Light Novel) Vol. 1
body.description: All Talk, All ActionNoel longs to be a Seeker like his heroic grandfather, slaying the beasts that emerge from Abysses and exploring far-off lands. Unfortunately, it turns out he's nothing but a measly Talker--a job with no combat skills whatsoever. Undaunted, Noel sets out to establish the strongest clan in all the land, using his silver-tongued Talker skills to unite assassins and heroes under his leadership.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Remeniscent of romeo and juliet with its devices as well as its classical character compass that is unusually thorough because it has drawn accurate traces from multiple cultures for the same type of period in their development that naturally mesh well even if the time periods don't necessarily match up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but it's got a mistake
reviews.reviewText: There is a part in the story where it gives clues about someone's fate, but it uses the wrong pronouns. This can confuse people if they aren't looking for it. I love the story but don't want these confusing errors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The trouble about writing an intelligent character is that they need to be smart. Detailing a plan that went well is not the same thing as having a good plan, especially when life can be so unpredictable.Pros- A story focused on a support class- Some good dialogueCons- If you don’t like androgyny or homosexuality in your story, then this isn’t for you.- A world full of people who do horrible things that makes the MC’s less horrible actions justifiable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't finish. Didn't want to.
reviews.reviewText: This is some some standard edgelord wish fulfillment fantasy. We got a MC who thinks he is smarter than the rest of the world and everyone who don't agree with him are trash, but he is too haughty to ever explain his actions to anyone. For the first 'conflict' of the plot, two members embezzled money from the party and he just straight up sold them into slavery. It was premeditated intent. As he got the news, he had connected the thought of 'oh, they took my money' to 'I'm going to get my money back and make some more by selling them'. I can't root for a protagonist like that, so I give up on reading this story. If that sounds like your cup of tea, go ahead and read this book. Cheers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: A truly great read in my opinion. I love how the MC is strong thru his smart not strength we always see. And a first in the personality department for me compared to other MC in other light novels. Slightly gritty too be not enough to be too dark,just enough to show to harsh reality in a fantasy world but still with strong characters. Excellent read, I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The author knows about suspense and realism
reviews.reviewText: This is a mature story where grisly things happen, but never gratuitously edgy. The MC is ruthless, but ultimately honorable. The way the author puts in so many suspenseful encounters made it feel more eventful than other light novels. I know I will be in for the ride next time as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great start to a series.
reviews.reviewText: A bit darker and more mature than what I was expecting. Looking forward to the next book when it comes out.

El libro empieza lento y no tan enganchante, pero conforme avanzas te enganchas más y más hasta que no te das cuenta que te lo acabaste, como algo increíble de este es la side history de Overdeath, en mi opinión fue lo mejor del primer volumen junto con el final con Finocchio

Der Protagonist hat eine interessante Persönlichkeit. Es ist immer wieder erstaunlich, wie er es schafft stärkere Gegner zu überwinden.Der Zeichenstil von Fame ist auch wieder eine Klasse für sich wie auch schon bei Berserk of Gluttony 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The story is very unique and original. If you want a book in which the MC is not overpowered, but very smart and merciless as to not forgive anyone that does wrong to him no matter who they are or how powerful they are, then this is for you. The author is very gifted in my opinion. The narration is absolutely flawless as it presents very pleasantly how a legend is born. Truly recommend it!
